page.title: 19HOME LIFE-LIFE STYLES
page.content: {Family life}in our area differs from home to home, but most seem to follow a similar pattern.They tend to {get up}each day between 7.am and 8.am and have a very{light breakfast -usually toast and coffee.The{mid-day {meal}is eaten at work or school and is usually sandwiches and a drink.The {evening meal}is usually a hot meal and is eaten on their knees in front of the television.The{food}is tinned, frozen or fresh but the fresh food tends to be eaten at weekends when the {shopping}is first done.Most families have a{fridge}and a{deep freeze}unit so food can be stored for a long period.Every family in our area owns a car,a television,a sterio unit,a washing machine and a spin dryer.Some have a vidio machine and a micro-wave oven.Most families work hard to own these{consumer goods}as{necessities.
